_sText:
aim_watertemple
Pretty intense aim map designed for LAN parties and fast paced gameplay. It's optimized to just 1.6MB size including nav, overview and background music. Gameplay: Both teams spawn with P228 pistols and can decide to either fall back to the stone gates to pick up mp5s, try to dash to the center tree and pick up the m4 lying there or get behind cover at the flanks and use the smokegrenades there to cover their advancing to the center or the enemy base. Thanks to all supporters! As always: If you add any of my maps to your rotation, please let me know so I can check by and gather feedback.

More projects at acidmaps.net.
